message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.GT, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with optimization problems related to finding the shortest distance between two points in a polygon, which is a classic problem in computational geometry (cs.CG). The use of linear time algorithms suggests that the paper may also be relevant to data structures (cs.DS). The problem of finding the shortest distance between two points can also be formulated as a graph problem, which falls under the category of discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The paper also involves optimization and game theory concepts, which may make it relevant to those sub-categories (cs.GT, cs.SI).
